text: Burton Kendall Wheeler (February 27, 1882January 6, 1975) was an American politician and lawyer. He was a member of the Democratic Party in Montana. He was a United States Senator from 1923 until 1947. He was Robert M. La Follette's running mate for the 1924 election. ==References== Category:1882 births Category:1975 deaths Category:Lawyers from Montana Category:United States senators from Montana Category:Politicians from Massachusetts Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Massachusetts
title: Burton K. Wheeler
